title: President summons NA, Senate sessions
content:
ISLAMABAD, JUNE 05 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari has summoned the sessions of National Assembly and Senate to be held separately on June 6 and June 7 respectively.
The president has summoned the National Assembly session on June 6 (Thursday) at 5:00pm while the Senate session is convened for Friday (June 7) at 10:30am, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release on Wednesday.
President Zardari summoned the sessions of both Houses of Parliament under Article 54 (1) of the Constitution of Pakistan.
